question: Which {state_var} utilised the {stat_method_1} percentage of its allocated NCAP funding as of June 2022?
code:
def true_code():
    import pandas as pd
    main_data = pd.read_pickle("preprocessed/main_data.pkl")
    states_data = pd.read_pickle("preprocessed/states_data.pkl")
    ncap_funding_data = pd.read_pickle("preprocessed/ncap_funding_data.pkl")

    ncap_funding_data = ncap_funding_data.groupby('{state_code}')[['Total fund released','Utilisation as on June 2022']].sum().reset_index()
    ncap_funding_data['utilisation_percent'] = (ncap_funding_data['Utilisation as on June 2022'] /
                                               ncap_funding_data['Total fund released']) * 100
    ans = ncap_funding_data.sort_values('utilisation_percent').iloc[{method_1}]['{state_code}']
    print(ans)

true_code()
